section-1.caption: Image 1
section-1.description: This is the first image in section one
options: Jessie is playing "Soldier" again.She puts on her uniform and marches around the house.
Jessie wants to be a postman. She is delivering the mail to her friends.
section-1.correctanswer: Jessie wants to be a postman. She is delivering the mail to her friends.

section-1.caption: Image 2
section-1.description: This is the second image in section one
options: First the men dug up the earth and raked it smooth.Then they planted the seeds in nice straight rows.Soon they will see the plants begin to grow.
The workers were busy with the harvest.Almost all of the vegetables had already been picked, packed in boxes , and taken to the market.The garden looked empty.
The vegetables were almost ready to harvest.The workers brought water in baskets and pails to water them.They had to be careful not to step on the vegetables and damage them.
section-1.correctanswer: The vegetables were almost ready to harvest.The workers brought water in baskets and pails to water them.They had to be careful not to step on the vegetables and damage them.

section-1.caption: Image 3
section-1.description: This is the third image in section one
options: " This is a nice comfortable room", thought Tim." The chairs look so comfortable. They make me want to curl up and go to sleep.
The house was decorated for the holidays. Ornaments and colored ribbons were hanging everywhere. They looked especially pretty in the window.
"This is a mess,"said mother." I want you yo take all of these dirty plates into the kitchen, right now!"
The room was ready at last. The table was set, all ready for grandma and grandpa when they came for Sunday dinner. Mom and I would bring the food soon.
section-1.correctanswer: The room was ready at last. The table was set, all ready for grandma and grandpa when they came for Sunday dinner. Mom and I would bring the food soon.

section-2.caption: Image 1
section-2.description: This is the first image in second section
options: The steam engine rumbled through the country. Along the way, it left a trail of smoke and ash that will turn the snow gray.
"All aboard," shouted the conductor.With smoke pouring out of the engine, the train pulled slowly out of the station.
section-2.correctanswer: The steam engine rumbled through the country. Along the way, it left a trail of smoke and ash that will turn the snow gray.

section-2.caption: Image 2
section-2.description: This is the second image in second section
options: The tree branches brushed the boat as it traveled up the river.Thousands of insects attacked the men as they slept on the deck.
The boat moved along the coast, past wide sandy beaches.Later the travelers would return to lie on the sand and swim in the warm water.
The people in the boat wanted to land on the shore and go for a walk. The problem was that a huge cliff rose right out of the water so there was nowhere to land
section-2.correctanswer: The people in the boat wanted to land on the shore and go for a walk. The problem was that a huge cliff rose right out of the water so there was nowhere to land

section-2.caption: Image 3
section-2.description: This is the third image in second section
options: "Nobody will know me in this costume", laughed Joey." Lots of kids are probably going to the really scared too! I have a huge goodie bag this Halloween."
The lonely old lady limped down the street, chattering to herself. She felt ill, but she didn't know the way to the doctor's office.
"I'm sick and tired of feeding those greedy birds",said Farmer Jones,"Old Bees Scarecrow here should stop them from gobbling up my grain."
When the thing attacked, Danny hit it with his club. He struggled and screamed until the men from town came to help.
section-2.correctanswer: "I'm sick and tired of feeding those greedy birds",said Farmer Jones,"Old Bees Scarecrow here should stop them from gobbling up my grain."
